title: RoomDungeons副本房间插件点击后没什么变化
txt_content:
副本房间的选择菜单点击后没什么变化
配置文件:
世外桃源:
        RoomCount: 2 #How many rooms are there for this dungeon.
        WarpName: sss
        MaxPlayersPerRoom: 4
        JoinCooldown: 20 #How long to wait for a new person to join after another person joined for a particular ROOM. A party join as a whole.
        commands-on-join:
                - sudo %player% cast warp %WarpName%%RoomNumber% #The last two variables will be the warpname defined above, and the room number. For this example, a player joins room 5, the command will be "sudo %player% cast warp Dung5", no space between "Dung5". Also, %player% stands for the player name.
        commands-on-leave:
                - sudo %player% home
                - heal %player%

replies.txt_content:
tmkmk 发表于 2016-9-18 10:48
桃园？花了1000大洋定做的？
不是 这是我弄的副本世界。
